experience.title: Walmart
bullets: Developed a support bot using React and NodeJS, available to approximately 1.5 million users, resulting in an overall decrease in support tickets and increase in associate productivity.
Architected and deployed a feedback module built for both code-in and as a Chrome extension, giving associates a voice on what products they prefer, and features they would like to see.
Migrated existing applications from on-prem hosting to Azure Cloud Services
Mentored junior developers for career and skill growth

experience.title: Hutchison Web Development, LLC
bullets: Custom tailored web applications and user interfaces for clients, ranging from e-commerce websites to electron desktop applications.
Collaborated with clients during the development process to ensure finished products meet expectations.

experience.title: Southern Reprographics, Inc.
bullets: Expedited orders via email, phone calls, as well as in person while maintaining workflow.
Electronically filed bidding jobs in the area for general and subcontractors to view and distribute using proprietary web-based programming.

education.title: Chingu
